an4.83:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.83:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogahetva appasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti, ananuvicca apariyogahetva pasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti—
an4.83:1.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an4.83:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an4.83:2.5: anuvicca pariyogahetva appasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti
an4.83:2.6: anuvicca pariyogahetva pasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti—
an4.83:2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
